data.name: WICKED
data.detailed_description:
Wicked is a first person co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. They say something evil lives in the house. Explore the house with your friends and find out if the rumors are true.

Gameplay


  • 4 Player Co-op
    Investigate the house with your friends. Stick together.

  • Singleplayer
    Venture into the house on your own. Not for the faint of heart.

  • Proximity Voice Chat
    Hear your friends screams echo through the house.

  • Difficulty Modes
    Easy, Normal, and Insane

  • Replayability
    Dynamic AI, difficulty modes, and level randomization make each playthrough unique.

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
